headline: The Opportunity To Buy Charter Communications Preferreds Below Par Before They Launch
summary: Liberty Broadband preferreds offer a 7% yield, trade below par, and will convert to Charter with a 2039 mandatory redemption. See why LBRDP stock is a buy.
